title: Dynamic Learning Management System (DLMS) Utilization Strategies for Active Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Designing collaborative activities with role-switching capabilities using personal devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more activity types (self-directed learning, pair work, group work) using DLMS.
Learners can interpret LDO packages and explain interface configurations and role allocation methods for each activity.
Learners can develop two or more group role-change scenarios for project-based assessments in teams of five.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
